description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMepLbmTestComplete notification indicates that
a loopback test has been issued and results are ready.

event.Summary: Loopback test issued and results are ready

description: The Target MAC Address Field to be transmitted: A unicast
destination MAC address.
This address will be used if the value of the column
dot1agCfmMepTransmitLbmDestIsMepId is 'false'.
variables.name: IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::dot1agCfmMepTransmitLbmDestMacAddress

description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMepLtmTestComplete notification indicates that
a linktrace test has been issued and results are ready. The
dot1agCfmMepTransmitLtmSeqNumber indicates the Transaction
Identifier to use to retrieve the Link-trace results.

event.Summary: Linktrace test issued and results are ready

description: The LTM Transaction Identifier
(dot1agCfmMepLtmNextSeqNumber) of the LTM sent.
The value returned is undefined if
dot1agCfmMepTransmitLtmResult is false.
variables.name: IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::dot1agCfmMepTransmitLtmSeqNumber

description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMepEthTestComplete notification indicates that
an eth-test has been issued and results are ready. The
tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrByteCount indicates the number of bytes contained in
the frame's Test TLV, and the tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrFailedBits and
tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrCrcFailures indicate the failure state of the
test. A value of Zero (0) for tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrFailedBits and a
value of 'false (2)' for tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrCrcFailures indicates
a successful test.

event.Summary: ETH test issued and results are ready

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrByteCount indicates the number of
bytes contained in the most recently received Eth-Tst frame Test TLV.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrByteCount

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrFailedBits indicates the number of
bits that did not match the test-pattern in the most recently received
Eth-Tst frame.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrFailedBits

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrCrcFailures indicates that CRC errors
were detected in the most recently received Eth-Tst frame.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepCurrCrcFailures

description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMepDMTestComplete notification indicates that a
One-Way-Delay-Test (OWDT) frame, or a Two-Way-Delay-Test (TWDT) response
was received. For an OWDT frame, traps are raised only when a delay
threshold of three (3) seconds is exceeded.

event.Summary: OWDT frame or TWDT frame response received

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepDelayTestDelay indicates the amount
of time, measured in microseconds, from when the test-frame was
transmitted to the time it was received minus the local processing time
taken by the remote system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepDelayTestDelay

description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMepAisStateChanged notification is generated when
a MEP enters or exits an AIS state.
The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepEthRxAis indicates the MEP is receiving
AIS test frames from one or more of its sub-layer MEPs.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepEthRxAis

description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMipEvaluation notification is generated when a
virtual MEP is created or deleted causing MIP reevaluation on the
service. On virtual MEP creation, any MIPs in the service will be
removed. On virtual MEP deletion, the MIPs are reevaluated.
The tmnxDot1agCfmNotifySvcId is used in notifications when a row
consisting of the service identifier may not exist when the trap
is issued.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmNotifySvcId

description: The tmnxDot1agCfmMepSLMTestComplete notification is generated when
a two-way Synthetic Loss Measurement (SLM) test is completed.

event.Summary: Two way synthetic loss measurement (SLM) test is completed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSLMTestComplete TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmTestId u 9999 TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmRemoteMepId u 1 TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmLastTxSeqF u 9999 TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketIn c 9999 TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossIn i 9999 TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossOut i 9999 TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketUnack u 9999

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmTestId indicates the test identifier
that was used to initiate the Synthetic Loss Measurement (SLM) test.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmTestId

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmRemoteMepId indicates the MEP
Identifier of the remote node involved in the test.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmRemoteMepId

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmLastTxSeqF indicates the last
received sequence number on the local node, transmitted by the
remote node.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmLastTxSeqF

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketIn indicates the number of
packets received during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketIn

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossIn indicates the number of
packets transmitted from the remote node but not received on the local
node during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossIn

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossOut indicates the number of
packets transmitted from the local node but not received on the remote
node during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossOut

description: The value of tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketUnack indicates the number of
unacknowledged lost packets during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tmnxDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketUnack
